subject: Re: New Minibox Files From Sarah Estep
author: Robin Henson
full_text:
The differences between the MB and FB are striking.  I heard nearly 
every word of every file exactly as you did, and it made my hair 
stand on end!!

Robin

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333" 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> hey,
> 
> I did a MB session today and asked for Ms. Estep.
> Mike and lisa were kind enough to bring her forward and help with 
the 
> communication. I believe she is still adjusting to being on the 
other 
> side and has not fully grasped how to send communication from the 
other 
> side, with an array of different boxes to work with.
> 
> I asked about the prior message concerning her whistle statement, 
the 
> answer I recieved was "they whistled often" I'm assuming she meant 
her 
> spirit contacts.
> 
> The files are posted in a sub folder marked MB_files in my main 
folder
> Bruces box files. In the future all sub folders for different box 
files 
> will be in this sub folder.
> 
> thanks guy's
> 
> bruce
>
